ielts_writing_task_1.description: IELTS Writing Task 1 typically involves describing visual information presented in various formats.

question_examples.description: Changes in ownership of electrical appliances and amount of time spent doing housework in households in one country between 1920 and 2019

graph_1.title: Percentage of households with electrical appliances

key_features: Comparison of two related trends over time
Correlation between appliance ownership and housework hours
Long time span (nearly a century)

question_examples.description: The manufacturing process of producing sugar from sugar cane

stages.name: Growing
stages.details: Sugar canes are grown for 12-18 months

stages.name: Harvesting
stages.details: Sugar canes are harvested both mechanically and manually

stages.name: Crushing
stages.details: Sugar canes are crushed to extract juice

stages.name: Purifying juice
stages.details: Juice is filtered through limestone filter

stages.name: Evaporator
stages.details: Juice is heated and becomes syrup

key_features: Linear process with clear numbered stages
Combination of agricultural and industrial processes
Both mechanical and manual operations
Multiple transformation stages (juice to syrup to crystals)
Technical equipment involved (centrifuge, evaporator, crushing machine)
Time specification only for initial growing stage

question_examples.description: Floor plans showing the current layout of Southwest Airport and its planned redevelopment for the following year
key_features: Expansion from 8 to 18 gates
Addition of new facilities (ATM, car hire, sky train, bag drop)
Introduction of shopping area
Maintained basic structure with departures and arrivals sections
More complex gate arrangement in new design
Enhanced passenger services and amenities
Integration of modern transport systems

question_examples.description: The recycling process of plastic bottles from collection to new products

stages.name: Collection
stages.details: Initial collection of plastic bottles in waste bins

stages.name: Transportation
stages.details: Bottles are transported by truck to recycling center

stages.name: Sorting
stages.details: Manual sorting at recycling centre to separate suitable materials

stages.name: Compressing
stages.details: Bottles are compressed into compact blocks

stages.name: Crushing
stages.details: Compressed blocks are crushed and washed

stages.name: Producing pellets
stages.details: Crushed material is formed into plastic pellets

stages.name: Heating
stages.details: Pellets are heated to form raw material

stages.name: End products
stages.details: Creation of new products (bottles, clothing, bags, etc.)

key_features: Circular process showing complete recycling cycle
Multiple transformation stages of materials
Combination of mechanical and chemical processes
Both manual and automated operations
Various end products from single source material
Integration of cleaning (washing) stage
Multiple physical state changes (solid to pellets to raw material)
